pullrequest.title: Prevent GUI from jumping around, pixel saving, analysis submission improvements

content.raw:
If you change the "frame" settings of the status label in Qt Designer, do any of them look any better? The "frameShadow" will probably change the background colour and "frameShape" will put a box around it. And yeah it could stand to gain a few pixels - you could change "margin" to 1 or 2 in its QLabel settings.

Would do it myself but they all look pretty much the same on Ubuntu.
content.html:
If you change the "frame" settings of the status label in Qt Designer, do any of them look any better? The "frameShadow" will probably change the background colour and "frameShape" will put a box around it. And yeah it could stand to gain a few pixels - you could change "margin" to 1 or 2 in its QLabel settings.

Would do it myself but they all look pretty much the same on Ubuntu.
